name: Out of Magic
description:
Out of Magic is a game about a wizard who has lost his magical powers.

You have two ability slots, one for movement and one for offense.

You can steal abilities from enemies by aiming at them and pressing the right mouse button. You then have access to one of their powers for a certain duration. You can see what kind of ability (movement or offense) they possess by holding down shift (which also slows down time).

We didn't manage to create a fully fledged level, so this is only a single room in which you can play around with the ability stealing mechanics.

Controls:

- Move : WASD

- Attack : Left Mouse Button

- Steal Ability : Right Mouse Button

- Jump / Fly : Spacebar

- Slow Down Time : Shift
